job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongJob SummarystrongppOur Client is seeking a data scientist to join a newly created team This individual will benbspmodeling complex business problems discover key insights and identify opportunities in order to accomplish this an academic and practical knowledge of applying statistical algorithmic mathematical and technological techniques is paramountnbspThe ideal candidate will have 35 years of experience preferably in an omni channelnbspenvironmentnbspppbrppstrongPrimary ResponsibilitiesstrongpulliCollaborate internally and crossdivisionally to formulate analytical applications that help solve business problemsliliExperience building and delivering complex systems that leverage various machine learning algorithmsliliWork with large and complex financial data setsliliActive involvement in RampD efforts to enable analysis data modeling product development and meaningful insights relevant to the enterprises domainsliulpbrppstrongQualificationsstrongpulliMS or higher in a quantitative field such as Computer Science Statistics or Mathematicslili3 years of Data Science experience with expertise in machine learning and statistical modelingliliStrong written amp verbal communication and presentation skills with experience crafting a compelling narrative supported by dataliul
